Gerçekten harika bir oyun. Hikayesi dışında bu oyunu sevmemin en büyük nedeni, özgün olması. Özgün mekanik, özgün karakterler. Oyunu 10 saate yakın oynadım, daha geçen hafta bitirmeme rağmen hala oynayasım geliyor. Valve'ın üçüncü oyunları çıkarmama takıntısını, Half Life'tan sonra bozmasını istediğim oyun serisi.

круто... ничего больше не сказать...

I like puzzle games. They are generally small games with colorful graphics, which offer puzzles to solve or traps to deconstruct to reach the next level, and they make me spend pleasant moments during the hours I spend in public transport.
Portal 2 (preceded by Portal, or even alone) is of a completely different dimension. First of all, we are immersed in the action: we no longer drag / open / pair virtual elements, we find ourselves really represented by this female character, as in a role-playing game, and it is she who must open passages, avoid turret fire, advance, progress, take lifts or escape... This makes the experience all the more fun as you don't feel like playing a puzzle game. This is very close from an adventure game, and even players who are not at all attracted by puzzles may find this game very interesting. The background story is engaging, very imaginative, and there are "Easter eggs" and nods to other Valve games (Half Life). For puzzle enthusiasts, the editor allows you to create and submit puzzles to the community, providing you with as much material as you want to continue "testing" long time after you finished the game. And of course, the cooperative mode allows two people to test their brain together, the hardest part being to decide who will be represented by which robot... In short, Portal 2 is an investment you can't regret.
Positive points: the rich story, the tests (more complex than in Portal 1), the long break in the old test rooms, the unexpected twists, the length of the game, the very realistic 3D graphics, the coop mode, the editor...
Negative points: Uh...

对于起源2引擎做的游戏，大部分玩着玩着都会头晕恶心，这个游戏也不例外。一开始的地方玩的我差点吐出来了，所以完了不到半小时就一直没玩。最近闲得无聊，就抱着试试的心态玩了玩，玩的次数多了，也不觉得头晕了。总体来说这个游戏真的不错，脑子太久没有动的玩家可以玩玩这个。

I mean, it's Portal 2. It's [b]great[/b], [i]of course[/i] it's great. The highest rated game on Steam, developed by Valve, and a video game sequel [i](which tend to be damn good, look at Uncharted 2, Bayonetta 2, Half-Life 2, and TF2, and ignore DMC 2)[/i]. It's amazing! Only criticism is that I didn't manage to play it sooner.
